titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Michigan championship celebration [sound recording].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

odd.head: Date/Time and Place of Event
odd.p: Recorded in Crisler Arena, Ann Arbor, MI on Jan. 11, 1998.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Ann Arbor, MI : Michigan Marching Band, c1998.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: M fanfare -- I can't turn you loose -- Let's go blue -- Opening remarks -- Player introductions -- Coaching staff introductions -- Support staff introductions -- Season recap -- The victors (trio) -- Presentation of Big Ten trophy ; Cheer 4 -- President's remarks -- Presentation of Rose Bowl trophy -- Introduction of Lloyd Carr -- Championship speech -- Heisman Trophy presentation -- Introduction of Sylvia Twine ; The impossible dream -- The victors -- Introduction of national championship trophies -- Presentation of Associated Press trophy -- Presentation of Grantland Rice trophy -- Presentation of MacArthur Bowl national champions -- Finale.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: The victory pep rally held in Crisler Arena. Features football staff introductions, presentation of awards and trophies, and marching band selections.
